title: thirupathi malay vaasa
sahitya:
tirupati malai vAsA shrIvAsA

tiruvadi sharaNam alarmel mangai neshA 

(tirupati)



anupallavi



kalA rasikOllAsA chidAnanda vilAsA

kaliyuga varadanAi kAtSi aLittiDum IshA 

(tirupati)



caraNam



mAnilam tazhaikka vanda mahAnubhAvA

mahAlakSmi dEviyai mArbil koNDa dEvA

sahasrakOTi bhAnu samAna prakAshA

jagamengum pugazh peTra tiruvenkateshA 

(tirupati)
